alert.note: Alert for Chesapeake; Gloucester; Isle of Wight; James City; Mathews; Norfolk, Portsmouth; Northampton; Suffolk; Surry; Virginia Beach (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued June 27 at 1:23AM EDT until June 27 at 3:00AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EDT EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of eastern Virginia and southeast Virginia, including the following areas, in eastern Virginia, Gloucester, Mathews and Northampton. In southeast Virginia, Chesapeake, Hampton/Poquoson, Isle of Wight, James City, Newport News, Norfolk/Portsmouth, Suffolk, Surry, Virginia Beach and York. * WHEN...Until 4 AM EDT early this morning. * IMPACTS...Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Low-water crossings may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Showers and thunderstorms will continue across the watch area for another few hours before ending. 1 to 2 inches of rain could fall in a short amount of time, which could result in flash flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Chesapeake; Gloucester; Isle of Wight; James City; Mathews; Norfolk, Portsmouth; Northampton; Suffolk; Surry; Virginia Beach
